title: PASS ME NOT OH GENTLE SAVIOUR
bible_ref: Jesus Son of David, have mercy on me. Luke 18:38
verses: Pass me not oh gentle Saviour=Hear my humble cry;=While on others Thou art calling=Do not pass me by
Let me at Thy throne of mercy=Find a sweet relief=Kneeling there in deep contrition=Help my unbelief
Trusting only, in Thy merit=Would I seek Thy face=Heal my wounded broken spirit=Save me by Thy grace.
Thou the Spring of all my comfort=More than life to me=Whom have I on earth beside Thee?=Whom in heav'n but Thee.
chorus: Saviour, Saviour=Hear my humble cry;=While on others Thou art calling=Do not pass me by.
